_header: Beseecheth meekly in right lowly wise
_description: A Supplicacion — three stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
Besechyth mekly in ryght lowly myseNow in hys nede your suget and
                    seruaunt…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…Wherfore do now a charytable dedeTo hys entent this lytill
                    byll to spede
BodFair16.Facsimiles:
Norton-Smith,  John. 
             “Introduction.” 
             Bodleian Library MS Fairfax 16.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
